version_description:
Greetings, treasure hunters!
Thank you for playing our game and leaving comments. They're very important to us.
In this update:
- We dug up a couple of bugs and fixed them for you.
- A few quirks in the levels have been fixed, so everything works properly now. Even level 56 :)
- We've added the first part of our heroes' story to the beginning of the game. In the future, the storyline will advance and expand.
- We've fixed the controls. They're easier to use now.
- Christopher has equipped his dog with a pager so they can stay in touch. Give it a try.
- A "Collections" section has been added to the campsite screen. Interesting items you've found are now stored there. You should definitely check it out!
There's lots of interesting stuff to come, including bonus game modes, new lands and levels, and a continuation to the treasure hunters' story! Stick around!

Arf, arf!

Arf, arf!

Meet the new version in which you will see:

- Cinematic story
- MFi Game Controller support
- Game Center
- Achievements
- iMessage
- Many fixes and details added

Have fun playing!
